metadata.synopsis: Dialog with the Brewer. He is a bloated creature who asks us to drink ourselves into oblivion with him. Player choices lead either to combat, or to the brewer drinking himself until he explodes.Twisted and creepy, a jovial barman who has been corrupted by curse to become a monstrous drunk. He speaks in fragments, swinging between melancholy, menace, and humour. Extra emphasis and derangment on bold words.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Approach the brewer on the main floor of the distillery.

179.text: Drink, gulp it down, wet your whistle. Tell your story.
179.context: CinematicNodeContext: The brewer drags itself to a bar counter, on which are two full mugs.

258.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
258.text: Drink, gulp it down, wet your whistle. Tell your story.
258.context: NodeContext: Twisted and creepy, a jovial barman who has been corrupted by curse.

288.speaker: Player
288.text: What in all Nine Hells are you?

49.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
49.text: Son of Thorm. Sot of Sword Coast.

103.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
103.text: Go on. Cheers, bottoms up, down the hatch.
103.context: NodeContext: still an offer, but becoming more of a threat

25.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
25.text: Hells. The curse has twisted this man beyond measure...
25.context: NodeContext: Discreetly murmured to the player (the being they're referring to is within earshot)

291.speaker: Lae'zel
291.text: Hells. The curse has twisted this man beyond measure...
291.context: NodeContext: Discreetly murmured to the player (the being they're referring to is within earshot)

113.speaker: Shadowheart
113.text: He's bloated like a corpse, and smells worse. Did the curse do this...?
113.context: NodeContext: Discreetly murmured to the player (the being they're referring to is within earshot)

5.speaker: Karlach
5.text: This guy looks like he had a long, long, long night. Might be best to keep him happy for now.
5.context: NodeContext: Discreetly murmured to the player (the being they're referring to is within earshot)

85.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
85.context: NodeContext: Discreetly murmured to the player (the being they're referring to is within earshot)

24.speaker: Player
24.context: NodeContext: Discreetly murmured to the player (the being they're referring to is within earshot)

101.text: *Leaning in, you can see how the creature's skin barely holds it together. The bulge of its belly is on the cusp of bursting wide open.*
101.context: NodeContext: Discreetly murmured to the player (the being they're referring to is within earshot)

33.speaker: Narrator
33.text: *Leaning in, you can see how the creature's skin barely holds it together. The bulge of its belly is on the cusp of bursting wide open.*
33.context: NodeContext: Discreetly murmured to the player (the being they're referring to is within earshot)

83.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
83.text: Near to bursting. The next few sips could be his last.
83.context: NodeContext: Discreetly murmured to the player (the being they're referring to is within earshot)

216.speaker: Lae'zel
216.text: Near to bursting. The next few sips could be his last.
216.context: NodeContext: Discreetly murmured to the player (the being they're referring to is within earshot)

300.speaker: Shadowheart
300.text: He looks set to burst - and we'll probably be left hip-deep in his juices.
300.context: NodeContext: Discreetly murmured to the player (the being they're referring to is within earshot)

292.speaker: Karlach
292.text: Ew, gods, I do not want whatever's inside that guy all over me.
292.context: NodeContext: Discreetly murmured to the player (the being they're referring to is within earshot)

167.speaker: Astarion
167.text: Keep your distance. He looks like he could burst any second.
167.context: NodeContext: Discreetly murmured to the player (the being they're referring to is within earshot)

268.speaker: Wyll
268.text: Bloated as a pufferfish. He takes a few drinks, and I bet he'll pop.
268.context: NodeContext: Discreetly murmured to the player (the being they're referring to is within earshot)

106.speaker: Gale
106.text: Look at the thing... A few more tastes of its own medicine and it'll burst.
106.context: NodeContext: Discreetly murmured to the player (the being they're referring to is within earshot)

66.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
66.text: Go on. Drink, make it drank, be drunk. You and I both, to our good health.
66.context: CinematicNodeContext: Brewer takes up the other tankard. Holds it up in a toasting gesture.

289.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
289.text: Go on. Drink, make it drank, be drunk. You and I both, to our good health.
289.context: CinematicNodeContext: Brewer takes up the other tankard. Holds it up in a toasting gesture.

64.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces after having drank the brewer's alcohol. It's potent, but they can handle it.

72.speaker: Player
72.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces after having drank the brewer's alcohol. It's potent, but they can handle it.

262.text: *The liquid burns your throat as you swallow, but otherwise, you feel no ill effects.*
262.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces after having drank the brewer's alcohol. It's potent, but they can handle it.

162.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
162.text: Now tell me a story, a fable, a saga. Delight me.
162.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Brewer refills his mug from the vat on his back.

121.speaker: Player
121.text: I massacred an entire Grove of Tieflings who thought me their protector.
121.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces slightly from the alcohol, but is otherwise unaffected

55.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
55.text: The only one left alive to tell your wicked tale. Kill another drink with me.

165.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
165.text: The only one left alive to tell your wicked tale. Kill another drink with me.

234.text: I stomp on the detritus of a dead town every day. Tell me of another life.

152.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
152.text: I stomp on the detritus of a dead town every day. Tell me of another life.

189.speaker: Player
189.text: I massacred an entire Grove of Tieflings who thought me their protector.
189.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces slightly from the alcohol, but is otherwise unaffected

2.text: From aboard a mind flayer vessel, I've witnessed the Hells themselves.
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces slightly from the alcohol, but is otherwise unaffected

94.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
94.text: So have I, when my cup runs dry. Let me pour you some sympathy.

145.text: So have I, when my cup runs dry. Let me pour you some sympathy.

122.text: A wasted journey. The Hells can be seen right here.

108.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
108.text: A wasted journey. The Hells can be seen right here.

285.text: From aboard a mind flayer vessel, I've witnessed the Hells themselves.
285.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces slightly from the alcohol, but is otherwise unaffected

271.speaker: Player
271.text: I gazed on nature's bounties in a verdant grove of druids.

32.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces slightly from the alcohol, but is otherwise unaffected

79.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
79.text: I am transported. I see the grove, the green, the grace before me!

171.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces slightly from the alcohol, but is otherwise unaffected

92.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
92.text: Spin a more fantastic fable. Entertain, engross, amuse me - or be amusement.
92.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces slightly from the alcohol, but is otherwise unaffected

267.speaker: Player
267.text: I slaughtered a gold dragon and collected its vast hoard.
267.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces slightly from the alcohol, but is otherwise unaffected

132.text: Hoard, you say? Sounds like you can stand me a round or seven. But later...
132.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces slightly from the alcohol, but is otherwise unaffected

65.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
65.text: Hoard, you say? Sounds like you can stand me a round or seven. But later...
65.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces slightly from the alcohol, but is otherwise unaffected

87.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
87.text: You ask. You drink. Then you amaze, enthuse, astound me. Again.
87.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces slightly from the alcohol, but is otherwise unaffected

84.speaker: Player
84.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces slightly from the alcohol, but is otherwise unaffected

231.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces slightly from the alcohol, but is otherwise unaffected

41.speaker: Narrator
41.text: *Your belly rumbles as the vile brew fills it, yet your mind remains miraculously steady.*

40.speaker: Thisobald Thorm

107.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
107.text: Tell me of foes felled, villains vanquished, beasts bested.

197.speaker: Player
197.text: I have transformed into an ancient beast. One of pure hate.
197.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces from the alcohol

46.speaker: Player
46.text: I have transformed into an ancient beast. One of pure hate.
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces from the alcohol

153.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
153.text: You have it within you still, I can tell from the crack in your smile and the gleam in your foul eye.

219.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
219.text: You have it within you still, I can tell from the crack in your smile and the gleam in your foul eye.

266.text: Pah! Hate is not special. It takes no beast to hate. It is the raw state of every man.

129.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
129.text: Pah! Hate is not special. It takes no beast to hate. It is the raw state of every man.

156.speaker: Player
156.text: I ripped apart winged imps spawned from the fires of Avernus.
156.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces from the alcohol

98.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
98.text: Did they bleed flame? Did their screams rend the sky? No - don't tell me. Let me dream.

130.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
130.text: Did they bleed flame? Did their screams rend the sky? No - don't tell me. Let me dream.

214.text: Pathetic! Paultry! Poxy puddle of piddle! Why not boast of snots dug from your nostril?

159.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
159.text: Pathetic! Paultry! Poxy puddle of piddle! Why not boast of snots dug from your nostril?

10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces from the alcohol

81.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
81.text: Mothers. Commiserations. This place is my mother. Its teats are copper. Its milk is barrel-aged.
81.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces from the alcohol

50.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
50.text: Mothers. Commiserations. This place is my mother. Its teats are copper. Its milk is barrel-aged.

297.text: We all have owlbear mothers. Mine was a lush. Unimpressive.
297.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces from the alcohol

157.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
157.text: We all have owlbear mothers. Mine was a lush. Unimpressive.
157.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces from the alcohol

62.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
62.text: No more blah, bland, banal. Give me blood. Or I take it.
62.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces from the alcohol

59.speaker: Player
59.text: I disembowelled a balor with its own pointed horn.
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces from the alcohol

78.text: Horns - not just for supping from. What noises he must have made.
78.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces from the alcohol

30.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
30.text: Horns - not just for supping from. What noises he must have made.
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces from the alcohol

134.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
134.text: Ask, question, make your query. And drink once more.
134.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces from the alcohol

241.speaker: Player
241.text: Who placed the curse on this land?
241.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces from the alcohol

74.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
74.text: Father Ketheric created. Father Ketheric sustains.

26.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
26.text: Drink it in, toss it down, lap it up.

169.speaker: Player
169.text: How did you become... what you are now?
169.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces from the alcohol

294.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
294.text: Father Ketheric's laughter. Not joy, not ever-never. Only laughter.

44.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
44.text: Questions done, finished, over. Only drink.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: How do the Thorms sustain the shadows?
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces from the alcohol

207.speaker: Player
207.text: What can you tell me about Ketheric?
207.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces from the alcohol

151.speaker: Player
151.text: What do you mean? How can I defeat Ketheric?
151.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces from the alcohol

7.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
7.text: No, must not, can not, will not mention her.

282.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
282.text: The customer is always right but also wrong.

265.speaker: Player
265.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces from the alcohol

177.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
177.text: *Each swig is as painful as the last, but you remain in otherwise sound mind and body.*
177.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces from the alcohol

302.speaker: Narrator
302.text: *Each swig is as painful as the last, but you remain in otherwise sound mind and body.*
302.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces from the alcohol

21.text: I - I know you. I knew, I know, I am knowing.
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Brewer drinks once more after speaking, and lets out a belchNodeContext: Increasingly drunk, starting to rave

286.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
286.text: I - I know you. I knew, I know, I am knowing.
286.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Brewer drinks once more after speaking, and lets out a belchNodeContext: Increasingly drunk, starting to rave

181.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
181.text: You want father's personal mysterious - (secret) - secret. No, not, never!
181.context: NodeContext: Starting to rave as a drunkard. The 'secret'in parentheses should be a loud whisper.

223.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
223.text: Father said, ordered, commanded. Don't say it, don't say it! The cage. Her cage.

39.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
39.text: Talk and... perish, die, buried. Buried in Thorm tomb. Father told me.
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Brewer drinks once more after speaking. He then lets out a deep, unsteady groan.NodeContext: Fully raving drunk.

139.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
139.text: I can't perish - no, nay, neither. Too strong, too...
139.context: CinematicNodeContext: The brewer groans in pain, then explodes in a shower of gore.NodeContext: Beyond drunk, about to die but denying it. Trails off at the end with a painful groan.

253.speaker: Narrator
253.text: *The third drink is too much. You're spinning down a black maelstrom toward the heart of oblivion. All goes dark.*
253.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) The player collapses to the floor, unconscious.

224.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
224.text: You want father's personal mysterious - (secret) - secret. No, not, never!
224.context: CinematicNodeContext: Smashes bar counter to end cinematic and transition into combatNodeContext: menacing, as you prepare to attack, smashing the bar counter in front of you

303.speaker: Player
303.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Brewer notices you’re not really drinking and he glares at you menacingly.

140.speaker: Player
140.text: Take a drink, but hold it in your mouth instead of swallowing.
140.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Brewer notices you’re not really drinking and he glares at you menacingly.

206.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
206.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Brewer notices you’re not really drinking and he glares at you menacingly.

225.speaker: Player
225.text: Swear eternal devotion to your divine as you knock back the drink.

235.speaker: Player
235.text: Channel your focus to a sharpened point as you drink.

269.speaker: Player
269.text: I ripped one head from an ettin and force-fed it to the other.
269.context: CinematicNodeContext: Smashes bar counter to end cinematic and transition into combatNodeContext: menacing, as you prepare to attack, smashing the bar counter in front of you

287.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
287.text: Its eyes were not bigger than its belly, then? Hah! Delightful. A grisly tale with a frothing ale.
287.context: CinematicNodeContext: Smashes bar counter to end cinematic and transition into combatNodeContext: menacing, as you prepare to attack, smashing the bar counter in front of you

239.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
239.text: Its eyes were not bigger than its belly, then? Hah! Delightful. A grisly tale with a frothing ale.

149.text: Lies of a lying liar. Let void take you.
149.context: CinematicNodeContext: Smashes bar counter to end cinematic and transition into combatNodeContext: menacing, as you prepare to attack, smashing the bar counter in front of you

96.speaker: Player
96.text: I conquered infamous hobgoblin Dror Ragzlin and his minions.

248.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
248.text: Minions? Many - good. More blood to slurp and marrow to suck out.

233.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
233.text: Minions? Many - good. More blood to slurp and marrow to suck out.

187.text: Hob-gob? Min-ion? Small beer. Small and sour. That tale does not wag.

112.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
112.text: Hob-gob? Min-ion? Small beer. Small and sour. That tale does not wag.

135.speaker: Player
135.text: I conquered infamous hobgoblin Dror Ragzlin and his minions.

212.speaker: Player
212.text: I slayed a hideous, pustule-ridden hag. She died a gruesome death.

12.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
12.text: Heh. Did you open her up and find the inner beauty? A wonderful tale. Fit for children.

18.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
18.text: Heh. Did you open her up and find the inner beauty? A wonderful tale. Fit for children.

240.text: A waste of tongue flaps. I wanted glory, not pus!

155.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
155.text: A waste of tongue flaps. I wanted glory, not pus!

278.speaker: Player
278.text: I slayed a hideous, pustule-ridden hag. She died a gruesome death.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: I challenged a daunting phase spider. Its corpse is all that remains.

252.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
252.text: Foul creatures. Too many limbs - like seeing double, triple, quadruple. Better as husks.

229.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
229.text: Foul creatures. Too many limbs - like seeing double, triple, quadruple. Better as husks.

43.text: Do you adventure in broom closets? I want a saga.

236.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
236.text: Do you adventure in broom closets? I want a saga.

126.speaker: Player
126.text: I challenged a daunting phase spider. Its corpse is all that remains.

95.speaker: Player
95.text: A bulette made me its prey, but proved no match for me.

42.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
42.text: Boo-what? I do not know what that is. But let us imagine it impressive.

176.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
176.text: Boo-what? I do not know what that is. But let us imagine it impressive.

11.text: What is that? A dessert wine? Unimpressive.

202.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
202.text: What is that? A dessert wine? Unimpressive.

290.speaker: Player
290.text: A bulette made me its prey, but proved no match for me.

298.speaker: Player
298.text: A towering creature rose from molten lava. I felled it with great wit and might.

61.speaker: Player
61.text: A towering creature rose from molten lava. I felled it with great wit and might.

184.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
184.text: Huh. Molten. Hot. Heavy. I saw such a beast in my latrine. A fierce foe.

29.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
29.text: Huh. Molten. Hot. Heavy. I saw such a beast in my latrine. A fierce foe.

244.text: Any fool can grapple with hot rocks. Just poke a fireplace.

115.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
115.text: Any fool can grapple with hot rocks. Just poke a fireplace.

131.speaker: Player
131.text: I bested an inquisitor - a dreaded champion of the Lich Queen, Vlaakith.

13.speaker: Player
13.text: I bested an inquisitor - a dreaded champion of the Lich Queen, Vlaakith.
13.context: InternalNodeContext: Bard advantage. Includes REALLY_GITHYANKI subnode.

230.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
230.text: I'll drink to that. I drink to everything, but especially to that. Bravo.
230.context: CinematicNodeContext: Unimpressed shake of the head at the end.NodeContext: 'of shite' but trails off at the end with a sigh, unimpressed

19.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
19.text: I'll drink to that. I drink to everything, but especially to that. Bravo.

133.text: That's all? A single fight? Against a lone knight? Sounds like a stinking pile of...
133.context: CinematicNodeContext: Unimpressed shake of the head at the end.NodeContext: 'of shite' but trails off at the end with a sigh, unimpressed

47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Smashes bar counter to end cinematic and transition into combatNodeContext: menacing, as you prepare to attack, smashing the bar counter in front of you

188.text: *The second drink hits you even harder. Nausea overwhelms you and it takes dire effort not to throw up all over the floor.*
188.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces and sways a little in reaction to the alcohol they just drank.

102.speaker: Player
102.text: Mime a sip of your drink.

137.speaker: Player
137.text: Take a sip, but spit out the liquour before the creature notices.

232.speaker: Player
232.text: As your drink, call upon your god to steady you.

260.speaker: Player
260.text: Fortify your spirit with a silent mantra as you drink.

14.speaker: Player
14.text: I gazed upon all Faerûn from the four peaks of the Spine of the World.

209.text: Such a trek, for the sake of a view? I will drink to your iron knees.

193.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
193.text: Such a trek, for the sake of a view? I will drink to your iron knees.

17.speaker: Player
17.text: I walked the corpse of a dead god in the timeless Astral Plane.

100.text: Adrift and unmourned, like a fly in red wine. Poetic.

196.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
196.text: Adrift and unmourned, like a fly in red wine. Poetic.

174.speaker: Player
174.text: I've seen the goblins' vile rituals with my own eyes.

293.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
293.text: A horror I can hardly bear, tolerate, endure, if only in my mind. Such daring!

60.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
60.text: A horror I can hardly bear, tolerate, endure, if only in my mind. Such daring!

161.text: Insects, roaches, vermin all. I bore of their petty customs.

45.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
45.text: Insects, roaches, vermin all. I bore of their petty customs.

175.speaker: Player
175.text: I've seen the goblins' vile rituals with my own eyes.

198.speaker: Player
198.text: A silver-tongued devil bade me feast in his lavishly appointed banquet hall.

56.speaker: Player
56.text: A silver-tongued devil bade me feast in his lavishly appointed banquet hall.

173.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
173.text: How I long for a feast. Eating, filling, gorging. Oh, to dine with devils!

304.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
304.text: How I long for a feast. Eating, filling, gorging. Oh, to dine with devils!

283.text: A devil is as he does. Promises, poetry, a story musty as must.

88.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
88.text: A devil is as he does. Promises, poetry, a story musty as must.

228.speaker: Player
228.text: I ascended a great tower infused with the most powerful of magic.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: I ascended a great tower infused with the most powerful of magic.

97.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
97.text: The work of wizards. That crackle, that spark, how I wish it still stirred within me!

237.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
237.text: The work of wizards. That crackle, that spark, how I wish it still stirred within me!

227.text: I am Thorm. My father's tower grazed the new moon. Yours means zero, nothing, naught.

146.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
146.text: I am Thorm. My father's tower grazed the new moon. Yours means zero, nothing, naught.

117.speaker: Player
117.text: I explored a lost fortress buried deep in the Underdark's bowels.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: I explored a lost fortress buried deep in the Underdark's bowels.

119.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
119.text: Treasures in the dark, like the dusty anniversary bottle forgotten in the widow's cellar. Delightful. Delicious.

109.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
109.text: Treasures in the dark, like the dusty anniversary bottle forgotten in the widow's cellar. Delightful. Delicious.

20.text: Bowels? Speak not of bowels. My guts are a firestorm - but I have the means to douse it.

57.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
57.text: Bowels? Speak not of bowels. My guts are a firestorm - but I have the means to douse it.

295.speaker: Player
295.text: I am the favoured vessel of an unknowably ancient creature.

183.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
183.text: A deal most sordid for powers profane. To sign away your very self... Compelling.

111.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
111.text: A deal most sordid for powers profane. To sign away your very self... Compelling.

180.text: Of pacts and deals and dotted lines - this bores me. You bore me.

273.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
273.text: Of pacts and deals and dotted lines - this bores me. You bore me.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: No. I will not share any stories.

168.text: *The creature's brew is more potent than anything you ever drank before. You feel instantly drunk and unsteady on your feet.*
168.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces and sways a little in reaction to the alcohol they just drank.

245.speaker: Narrator
245.text: *The creature's brew is more potent than anything you ever drank before. You feel instantly drunk and unsteady on your feet.*
245.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces and sways a little in reaction to the alcohol they just drank.

276.speaker: Player
276.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces as mimicking drinking. The brewer drinks after being convinced that the player was really drinking.

218.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
218.text: Ah. Elixir. But such a small sip you take... Fear not. You will soon quaff as I do.
218.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces as mimicking drinking. The brewer drinks after being convinced that the player was really drinking.

0.text: Ah. Elixir. But such a small sip you take... Fear not. You will soon quaff as I do.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player grimaces as mimicking drinking. The brewer drinks after being convinced that the player was really drinking.

31.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
31.text: Ah. Elixir. But such a small sip you take... Fear not. You will soon quaff as I do.
31.context: CinematicNodeContext: Brewer drinks deeply before speaking.NodeContext: Sigh of satisfaction, followed by a querying tone about why the player drinks so modestly (in fact they only pretended to drink)

118.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
118.text: Ah. Elixir. But such a small sip you take... Fear not. You will soon quaff as I do.
118.context: CinematicNodeContext: Brewer drinks deeply before speaking.NodeContext: Sigh of satisfaction, followed by a querying tone about why the player drinks so modestly (in fact they only pretended to drink)

222.text: ...Not a single drop swallowed. You must think me a ripe fool.
222.context: CinematicNodeContext: The brewer drinks, then frowns at the player

138.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
138.text: ...Not a single drop swallowed. You must think me a ripe fool.
138.context: CinematicNodeContext: The brewer drinks, then frowns at the player

128.speaker: Player
128.text: Whisper a prayer to your god, then drink.

270.speaker: Player
270.text: Steady your body and mind, then drink.

89.speaker: Player
89.text: Pretend to swig deeply, avoiding the liquid at the last moment.

217.speaker: Player
217.context: CinematicNodeContext: brewer smashes bar with his fists before combat beginsNodeContext: Building anger. Combat ensues immediately afterwards.

272.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
272.context: CinematicNodeContext: brewer smashes bar with his fists before combat beginsNodeContext: Building anger. Combat ensues immediately afterwards.

35.speaker: Astarion
35.text: I've seen some grotesques in my time, but this is something else.
35.context: NodeContext: Discreetly murmured to the player (the being they're referring to is within earshot)

104.speaker: Wyll
104.text: The curse has wrecked this man. This is no life - this is torture.
104.context: NodeContext: Discreetly murmured to the player (the being they're referring to is within earshot)

70.speaker: Gale
70.text: Was this once a man? The shadows have corrupted him beyond comprehension.
70.context: NodeContext: Discreetly murmured to the player (the being they're referring to is within earshot)

120.speaker: Player
120.text: What is it that you're serving?

221.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
221.text: Only the best. Oblivion. And beyond.

166.speaker: Player
166.text: I already drank some wine earlier, thank you.

147.speaker: Thisobald Thorm
147.text: A pixie's piss. I give you Blackfire.
